lot

version semantics defaulting validation

list watch type semantics that

a pretty steep cost for certain types of

dependency on kubernetes
now for most things that's not generally
too bad because
you're generally deploying applications
on infrastructure that already exist

building applications that manage
that underlying infrastructure for
example in the cluster api

to be able to stand up the cluster api

has somebody already done this you know
there's been

what is the goal um that i'm trying to

like i said i want to be able to build a
minimal api server capable of supporting
crds
but would also like that to be able to

dependency on
another system to be running in advance

able to avoid

because that creates a lot of

i don't want to recreate
